content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":262372,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間を子を産んだ汚らわしい下級悪魔では無いか、贖罪として三〇〇匹の悪魔生産をさせている最中に","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't it that filthy low-ranking demon who bore a human child? While being made to produce 300 demons as atonement,"},{"lineNumber":262373,"originalJapaneseLine":"逃げ出したと聞いていたが、まさか生きていたのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard it escaped, but could it really still be alive?"},{"lineNumber":262374,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ネプラカス本体状態の化け物っぽい叫び声、○▽◆とかの中に普通の言葉が混じる、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Nepurakasu's true form lets out a monster-like scream with ordinary words mixed in among garbled noises like ○▽◆,"},{"lineNumber":262375,"originalJapaneseLine":"　フェリスにだけは伝わりそれとなく通訳、あれもしかして意思があるのか・・）","translatedEnglishLine":" only Felis can understand and subtly translate—does it perhaps have a will...)"},{"lineNumber":262376,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ネプラカス周りは後で修正入るやも）","translatedEnglishLine":"(The part around Nepurakasu may be revised later)"},{"lineNumber":262377,"originalJapaneseLine":"情けをかけすぎたか、今度はその手足をひっこぬいて逃げれぬようにして悪魔母体として死ぬまで贖罪をさせてやろう（的なことを言ってる）","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps I was too merciful; this time I'll tear off its limbs so it can't escape and make it atone by serving as a demon host until it dies (something along those lines)."},{"lineNumber":262378,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスが通訳するが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Felis translates,"},{"lineNumber":262379,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれだけ敵意むき出しなら通訳されんでも分かる、","translatedEnglishLine":"But with hostility that obvious, you don't even need a translation to understand,"},{"lineNumber":262380,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスおしっこちびりそうなくらい怯える","translatedEnglishLine":"Felis is so terrified she looks like she's about to wet herself."},{"lineNumber":262381,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス、やいやい、これは俺の悪魔だ、勝手はゆるさん","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, hey hey, this is my demon—I won't allow you to do as you please."},{"lineNumber":262382,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう少し会話して戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"After a bit more conversation, the battle will begin."},{"lineNumber":262383,"originalJapaneseLine":"　フェリスは、駄目・・・いいから、逃げないとというが無視","translatedEnglishLine":"Felis says, \"No... it's no good, you have to run,\" but is ignored."},{"lineNumber":262384,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の女を苛めた奴は絶対に殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyone who torments my woman, I will definitely kill.\""},{"lineNumber":262385,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"[Battle]"},{"lineNumber":262386,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスの動きが止まる・・・そして、人間体の何かにばける","translatedEnglishLine":"Nepurakasu's movements stop... then it transforms into a human-like form."},{"lineNumber":262387,"originalJapaneseLine":"（人間体のネプラカスは流ちょうに語る、飛鳥了とか渚カオルタイプ？　やっぱりこの辺も後で修正入るかも）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Human-form Nepurakasu speaks fluently, like Asuka Ryo or Nagisa Kaoru type? This might also be revised later.)"},{"lineNumber":262388,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここでは、決着を付けては駄目なので、ネプラカスは一言二言いって立ち去る","translatedEnglishLine":"Since the fight can't be settled here, Nepurakasu says a word or two and leaves."},{"lineNumber":262389,"originalJapaneseLine":"　負け惜しみやそんな話ではなく、ランスの事が目に入ってないような感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s not sour grapes or such—it seems as if it's not even paying attention to Lance."},{"lineNumber":262390,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういえば、あの件がとか別の事を気になって立ち去る感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems distracted by something else, like that matter, and leaves."},{"lineNumber":262391,"originalJapaneseLine":"助かった・・とランス達。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We’re saved...\" says Lance and the others."},{"lineNumber":262392,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスは放心状態","translatedEnglishLine":"Felis is in a daze."},{"lineNumber":262393,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か会話あってもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe there could be some conversation."},{"lineNumber":262394,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは倒された。フェリスがネプラカスに捕まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance is defeated. Felis is captured by Nepurakasu."},{"lineNumber":262395,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのままどこかに連れていかれてゲームオーバー","translatedEnglishLine":"She is taken somewhere, and it’s game over."},{"lineNumber":262396,"originalJapaneseLine":"通り過ぎるまでじっこ我慢、我慢・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hold in your pee until it passes... hold on..."},{"lineNumber":262397,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・そして通り過ぎた","translatedEnglishLine":"...and then it passed."},{"lineNumber":262398,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほっとみんな一息つく","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone exhales in relief."},{"lineNumber":262399,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーの内心の感想","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukuu’s inner thoughts:"},{"lineNumber":262400,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれが上級悪魔、始めてみました、神と同様な規格外の存在でした。","translatedEnglishLine":"That was a high-ranking demon, I saw one for the first time—it was an extraordinary being like a god."},{"lineNumber":262401,"originalJapaneseLine":"手に負える相手ではないですが、１級神アリスと比べるとまだいえ・・到底無理ですね、人がかなう相手ではない","translatedEnglishLine":"Not someone we can handle; compared to First-Class God Alice, well... no, it’s impossible. Humans can’t match such an opponent."},{"lineNumber":262402,"originalJapaneseLine":"じっとしていたのは正解です","translatedEnglishLine":"Staying still was the right choice."},{"lineNumber":262403,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の者の感想も・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Others’ impressions as well..."},{"lineNumber":262404,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスがぽつりという","translatedEnglishLine":"Felis says quietly,"},{"lineNumber":262405,"originalJapaneseLine":"　２級魔神ネプラカス・・怖い存在です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Second-rank demon god Nepurakasu... a terrifying presence."},{"lineNumber":262406,"originalJapaneseLine":"　普通上級悪魔は長い年月を生きる事で達観しているのか、ほとんど何に関しても不干渉な存在なのですが","translatedEnglishLine":"Normally high-level demons grow detached over long years and are mostly indifferent to everything,"},{"lineNumber":262407,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ネプラカスだけは別で、どうして分からないが・・あわわ","translatedEnglishLine":"But Nepurakasu is different, I don’t know why... awawa (startled sounds)."},{"lineNumber":262408,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か思い出したように震え出す","translatedEnglishLine":"She starts trembling as if recalling something."},{"lineNumber":262409,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、もういい黙っていろ。言わなくていい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, enough already, be quiet. You don’t have to say anything."},{"lineNumber":262410,"originalJapaneseLine":"別に今は、あれと何か事をかまえるつもりはない、安心しろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now I don’t intend to confront that thing—rest assured."},{"lineNumber":262411,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺の目的は、ここで魔物大将軍ピサロを倒す事だ","translatedEnglishLine":"My goal is to defeat the monster general Pizarro here."},{"lineNumber":262412,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪魔迷宮を移動中のランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others move through the demon labyrinth."},{"lineNumber":262413,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがみんなから離れておしっこに行く","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance separates from everyone to go take a pee."},{"lineNumber":262414,"originalJapaneseLine":"洞窟内、あそこの崖でしようといくと","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the cave, he heads to the cliff over there to go."},{"lineNumber":262415,"originalJapaneseLine":"先に誰かがいた、ダークランスがおしっこしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone’s there first—Dark Lance is peeing."},{"lineNumber":262416,"originalJapaneseLine":"横に立って連れションを始めるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance stands next to him and starts peeing together."},{"lineNumber":262417,"originalJapaneseLine":"あわててダークランスが逃げようとするが、おしっこ止まらない","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance hurriedly tries to run away, but his pee won’t stop."},{"lineNumber":262418,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちんこ小さいな、ピンク色でしんぴいぽいな、まだむけてないか、がはははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Your dick’s small, pink and kinda cute-looking, not even circumcised yet, gahahaha."},{"lineNumber":262419,"originalJapaneseLine":"とかおちょくる","translatedEnglishLine":"He mocks him like that."},{"lineNumber":262420,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふん、背の高さだって、ちんこの大きさだってお前を超えてやる","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, I’ll surpass you in height and dick size."},{"lineNumber":262421,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺を超えるか、大きくでたもんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Trying to surpass me? That’s bold."},{"lineNumber":262422,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういやお前、女知っているのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, do you know women?"},{"lineNumber":262423,"originalJapaneseLine":"びくっ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"(twitches in surprise)"},{"lineNumber":262424,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺がお前くらいの頃には・・て見た目は大きいが、まだお前産まれて数年だったんだな","translatedEnglishLine":"When I was about your age... even though you look big, you were only born a few years ago."},{"lineNumber":262425,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットもそうだが、成長が早すぎてびびるわ","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset too, but your growth is too fast—it’s scary."},{"lineNumber":262426,"originalJapaneseLine":"で、女は知っているのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"So, do you know women?"},{"lineNumber":262427,"originalJapaneseLine":"な、なんの事だ、女　そりゃ分かるぞ。男と女　うん","translatedEnglishLine":"W-what do you mean? Women? Yeah, I know. Men and women, yeah."},{"lineNumber":262428,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうじゃなくてセックスしたのかどうかと聞いているのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m not asking that, I mean have you had sex or not?"},{"lineNumber":262429,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・・真っ赤（セックスが何かは知っている）","translatedEnglishLine":".....[blushes deeply] (He knows what sex is.)"},{"lineNumber":262430,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ、まだか","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, not yet?"},{"lineNumber":262431,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様を超えようとおもったら、そこが壁になるもな。","translatedEnglishLine":"If you want to surpass me, that’s the wall you have to overcome."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間を子を産んだ汚らわしい下級悪魔では無いか、贖罪として三〇〇匹の悪魔生産をさせている最中に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't it that filthy low-ranking demon who bore a human child? While being made to produce 300 demons as atonement,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ出したと聞いていたが、まさか生きていたのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard it escaped, but could it really still be alive?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ネプラカス本体状態の化け物っぽい叫び声、○▽◆とかの中に普通の言葉が混じる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Nepurakasu's true form lets out a monster-like scream with ordinary words mixed in among garbled noises like ○▽◆,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスにだけは伝わりそれとなく通訳、あれもしかして意思があるのか・・）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only Felis can understand and subtly translate—does it perhaps have a will...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ネプラカス周りは後で修正入るやも）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The part around Nepurakasu may be revised later)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情けをかけすぎたか、今度はその手足をひっこぬいて逃げれぬようにして悪魔母体として死ぬまで贖罪をさせてやろう（的なことを言ってる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps I was too merciful; this time I'll tear off its limbs so it can't escape and make it atone by serving as a demon host until it dies (something along those lines).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスが通訳するが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis translates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれだけ敵意むき出しなら通訳されんでも分かる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But with hostility that obvious, you don't even need a translation to understand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスおしっこちびりそうなくらい怯える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis is so terrified she looks like she's about to wet herself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、やいやい、これは俺の悪魔だ、勝手はゆるさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, hey hey, this is my demon—I won't allow you to do as you please.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し会話して戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a bit more conversation, the battle will begin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスは、駄目・・・いいから、逃げないとというが無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis says, "No... it's no good, you have to run," but is ignored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の女を苛めた奴は絶対に殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyone who torments my woman, I will definitely kill."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスの動きが止まる・・・そして、人間体の何かにばける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nepurakasu's movements stop... then it transforms into a human-like form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （人間体のネプラカスは流ちょうに語る、飛鳥了とか渚カオルタイプ？　やっぱりこの辺も後で修正入るかも）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Human-form Nepurakasu speaks fluently, like Asuka Ryo or Nagisa Kaoru type? This might also be revised later.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでは、決着を付けては駄目なので、ネプラカスは一言二言いって立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the fight can't be settled here, Nepurakasu says a word or two and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負け惜しみやそんな話ではなく、ランスの事が目に入ってないような感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not sour grapes or such—it seems as if it's not even paying attention to Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえば、あの件がとか別の事を気になって立ち去る感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems distracted by something else, like that matter, and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 助かった・・とランス達。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We’re saved..." says Lance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスは放心状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis is in a daze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か会話あってもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe there could be some conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは倒された。フェリスがネプラカスに捕まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance is defeated. Felis is captured by Nepurakasu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのままどこかに連れていかれてゲームオーバー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is taken somewhere, and it’s game over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通り過ぎるまでじっこ我慢、我慢・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hold in your pee until it passes... hold on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・そして通り過ぎた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...and then it passed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっとみんな一息つく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone exhales in relief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの内心の感想
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukuu’s inner thoughts:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれが上級悪魔、始めてみました、神と同様な規格外の存在でした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was a high-ranking demon, I saw one for the first time—it was an extraordinary being like a god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手に負える相手ではないですが、１級神アリスと比べるとまだいえ・・到底無理ですね、人がかなう相手ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not someone we can handle; compared to First-Class God Alice, well... no, it’s impossible. Humans can’t match such an opponent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じっとしていたのは正解です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Staying still was the right choice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者の感想も・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others’ impressions as well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスがぽつりという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis says quietly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２級魔神ネプラカス・・怖い存在です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Second-rank demon god Nepurakasu... a terrifying presence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通上級悪魔は長い年月を生きる事で達観しているのか、ほとんど何に関しても不干渉な存在なのですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Normally high-level demons grow detached over long years and are mostly indifferent to everything,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスだけは別で、どうして分からないが・・あわわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Nepurakasu is different, I don’t know why... awawa (startled sounds).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か思い出したように震え出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She starts trembling as if recalling something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、もういい黙っていろ。言わなくていい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, enough already, be quiet. You don’t have to say anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別に今は、あれと何か事をかまえるつもりはない、安心しろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now I don’t intend to confront that thing—rest assured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の目的は、ここで魔物大将軍ピサロを倒す事だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My goal is to defeat the monster general Pizarro here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔迷宮を移動中のランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others move through the demon labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがみんなから離れておしっこに行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance separates from everyone to go take a pee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟内、あそこの崖でしようといくと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the cave, he heads to the cliff over there to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先に誰かがいた、ダークランスがおしっこしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone’s there first—Dark Lance is peeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横に立って連れションを始めるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance stands next to him and starts peeing together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわててダークランスが逃げようとするが、おしっこ止まらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance hurriedly tries to run away, but his pee won’t stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちんこ小さいな、ピンク色でしんぴいぽいな、まだむけてないか、がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your dick’s small, pink and kinda cute-looking, not even circumcised yet, gahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とかおちょくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He mocks him like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、背の高さだって、ちんこの大きさだってお前を超えてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, I’ll surpass you in height and dick size.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺を超えるか、大きくでたもんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to surpass me? That’s bold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういやお前、女知っているのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, do you know women?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びくっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (twitches in surprise)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺がお前くらいの頃には・・て見た目は大きいが、まだお前産まれて数年だったんだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I was about your age... even though you look big, you were only born a few years ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットもそうだが、成長が早すぎてびびるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset too, but your growth is too fast—it’s scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、女は知っているのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, do you know women?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: な、なんの事だ、女　そりゃ分かるぞ。男と女　うん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what do you mean? Women? Yeah, I know. Men and women, yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうじゃなくてセックスしたのかどうかと聞いているのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not asking that, I mean have you had sex or not?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・・真っ赤（セックスが何かは知っている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: .....[blushes deeply] (He knows what sex is.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、まだか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, not yet?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様を超えようとおもったら、そこが壁になるもな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to surpass me, that’s the wall you have to overcome.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間を子を産んだ汚らわしい下級悪魔では無いか、贖罪として三〇〇匹の悪魔生産をさせている最中に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't it that filthy low-ranking demon who bore a human child? While being made to produce 300 demons as atonement,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ出したと聞いていたが、まさか生きていたのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard it escaped, but could it really still be alive?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ネプラカス本体状態の化け物っぽい叫び声、○▽◆とかの中に普通の言葉が混じる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Nepurakasu's true form lets out a monster-like scream with ordinary words mixed in among garbled noises like ○▽◆,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスにだけは伝わりそれとなく通訳、あれもしかして意思があるのか・・）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only Felis can understand and subtly translate—does it perhaps have a will...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ネプラカス周りは後で修正入るやも）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The part around Nepurakasu may be revised later)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情けをかけすぎたか、今度はその手足をひっこぬいて逃げれぬようにして悪魔母体として死ぬまで贖罪をさせてやろう（的なことを言ってる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps I was too merciful; this time I'll tear off its limbs so it can't escape and make it atone by serving as a demon host until it dies (something along those lines).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスが通訳するが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis translates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれだけ敵意むき出しなら通訳されんでも分かる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But with hostility that obvious, you don't even need a translation to understand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスおしっこちびりそうなくらい怯える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis is so terrified she looks like she's about to wet herself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、やいやい、これは俺の悪魔だ、勝手はゆるさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, hey hey, this is my demon—I won't allow you to do as you please.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し会話して戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a bit more conversation, the battle will begin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスは、駄目・・・いいから、逃げないとというが無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis says, "No... it's no good, you have to run," but is ignored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の女を苛めた奴は絶対に殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyone who torments my woman, I will definitely kill."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスの動きが止まる・・・そして、人間体の何かにばける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nepurakasu's movements stop... then it transforms into a human-like form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （人間体のネプラカスは流ちょうに語る、飛鳥了とか渚カオルタイプ？　やっぱりこの辺も後で修正入るかも）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Human-form Nepurakasu speaks fluently, like Asuka Ryo or Nagisa Kaoru type? This might also be revised later.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでは、決着を付けては駄目なので、ネプラカスは一言二言いって立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the fight can't be settled here, Nepurakasu says a word or two and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負け惜しみやそんな話ではなく、ランスの事が目に入ってないような感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not sour grapes or such—it seems as if it's not even paying attention to Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえば、あの件がとか別の事を気になって立ち去る感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems distracted by something else, like that matter, and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 助かった・・とランス達。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We’re saved..." says Lance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスは放心状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis is in a daze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か会話あってもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe there could be some conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは倒された。フェリスがネプラカスに捕まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance is defeated. Felis is captured by Nepurakasu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのままどこかに連れていかれてゲームオーバー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is taken somewhere, and it’s game over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通り過ぎるまでじっこ我慢、我慢・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hold in your pee until it passes... hold on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・そして通り過ぎた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...and then it passed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっとみんな一息つく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone exhales in relief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの内心の感想
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukuu’s inner thoughts:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれが上級悪魔、始めてみました、神と同様な規格外の存在でした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was a high-ranking demon, I saw one for the first time—it was an extraordinary being like a god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手に負える相手ではないですが、１級神アリスと比べるとまだいえ・・到底無理ですね、人がかなう相手ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not someone we can handle; compared to First-Class God Alice, well... no, it’s impossible. Humans can’t match such an opponent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じっとしていたのは正解です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Staying still was the right choice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者の感想も・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others’ impressions as well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスがぽつりという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis says quietly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２級魔神ネプラカス・・怖い存在です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Second-rank demon god Nepurakasu... a terrifying presence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通上級悪魔は長い年月を生きる事で達観しているのか、ほとんど何に関しても不干渉な存在なのですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Normally high-level demons grow detached over long years and are mostly indifferent to everything,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスだけは別で、どうして分からないが・・あわわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Nepurakasu is different, I don’t know why... awawa (startled sounds).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か思い出したように震え出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She starts trembling as if recalling something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、もういい黙っていろ。言わなくていい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, enough already, be quiet. You don’t have to say anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別に今は、あれと何か事をかまえるつもりはない、安心しろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now I don’t intend to confront that thing—rest assured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の目的は、ここで魔物大将軍ピサロを倒す事だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My goal is to defeat the monster general Pizarro here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔迷宮を移動中のランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others move through the demon labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがみんなから離れておしっこに行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance separates from everyone to go take a pee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟内、あそこの崖でしようといくと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the cave, he heads to the cliff over there to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先に誰かがいた、ダークランスがおしっこしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone’s there first—Dark Lance is peeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横に立って連れションを始めるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance stands next to him and starts peeing together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわててダークランスが逃げようとするが、おしっこ止まらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance hurriedly tries to run away, but his pee won’t stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちんこ小さいな、ピンク色でしんぴいぽいな、まだむけてないか、がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your dick’s small, pink and kinda cute-looking, not even circumcised yet, gahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とかおちょくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He mocks him like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、背の高さだって、ちんこの大きさだってお前を超えてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, I’ll surpass you in height and dick size.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺を超えるか、大きくでたもんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to surpass me? That’s bold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういやお前、女知っているのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, do you know women?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びくっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (twitches in surprise)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺がお前くらいの頃には・・て見た目は大きいが、まだお前産まれて数年だったんだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I was about your age... even though you look big, you were only born a few years ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットもそうだが、成長が早すぎてびびるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset too, but your growth is too fast—it’s scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、女は知っているのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, do you know women?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: な、なんの事だ、女　そりゃ分かるぞ。男と女　うん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what do you mean? Women? Yeah, I know. Men and women, yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうじゃなくてセックスしたのかどうかと聞いているのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not asking that, I mean have you had sex or not?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・・真っ赤（セックスが何かは知っている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: .....[blushes deeply] (He knows what sex is.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、まだか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, not yet?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様を超えようとおもったら、そこが壁になるもな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to surpass me, that’s the wall you have to overcome.
